name: Davis Davis Attorneys P.C.
overview:
THE FUENTES LAW FIRM, (THE BANKRUPTCY ATTORNEY) is based in Los Angeles, CA, and it is “Debt Relief Agency” serving both consumer and business debtors.

THE BANKRUPTCY ATTORNEY is not just a any bankruptcy law firm, it is a full-service law firm with an integral state-of-the-art computer-program-network center. From the word â€œAttorneysâ€ in our return address to our ability to take legal action, we can do more with your debts that a mere agency can. We are dedicated to protect your Rights as a consumer in distress and help you avoid Collectionâ€ agents and have been in the business for the main purpose in mind of avoiding to pay debt collection. Our firm strives to exceed our clientsâ€™ expectations and as a result we have developed and maintained client relationships with advocacy groups. Our clients are continually impressed with our result rates versus other firms. We continually work to improve our performance and to fine-tune the bankruptcy process and strategies for best results. We recognize the stress you are going through and will help you since the start, free initial consultation, free credit report and easy payment plan. Our staff is hand picked and professionally trained in compliance by our attorney and in practice by our manager.
